00026   /*generate instance of static object*/
00027   std::map<std::string, AhcTempProvider*> SiPMTemperatureProcessor::_tempProviderMap;

00033   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00034   AhcTempProvider* SiPMTemperatureProcessor::getTemperatureProvider(const std::string& processorName)
00035   {
00036     return _tempProviderMap[processorName];
00037   }

00044   SiPMTemperatureProcessor::SiPMTemperatureProcessor() : Processor("SiPMTemperatureProcessor")
00045   {
00046 
00047     _description = "Provides the temperature of the SiPMs";
00048 
00049     registerProcessorParameter( "AHC_SRO_ModData" ,
00050                                 "Name of the conditions collection for the AHC Slow r/o data.",
00051                                 _ahcSroModDataColName,
00052                                 std::string("AhcSroModData_fixed") ) ;
00053 
00054     registerProcessorParameter("TemperatureSensorCalibrationCollectionName",
00055                                "Name of collection of temperature sensors",
00056                                _temperatureSensorCalibrationColName,
00057                                std::string("AhcTempSensorCalib"));
00058 
00059     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00060                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides"
00061                                 " the geometry of the detector.",
00062                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00063                                 std::string("AHC") ) ;
00064 
00065     lcio::FloatVec sanityRangeVec;
00066     sanityRangeVec.push_back(0);
00067     sanityRangeVec.push_back(45);
00068     registerProcessorParameter( "TempProviderSanityRange" ,
00069                                 "Sanity range of the temperature provider",
00070                                 _tempProviderSanityRangeVec,
00071                                 sanityRangeVec);
00072 
00073     registerOptionalParameter( "TempProviderModel" ,
00074                                "Temperature model: if 'simple', use AhcSimpleTempProvider,"
00075                                " else 'MedianFilter' AhcMedianFilterTempProvider, "
00076                                " else 'Cern2010' AhcCern2010TempProvider",
00077                                _tempProviderModelName,
00078                                std::string("simple"));
00079 
00080     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollection",
00081                                "Name of output collection of temperatures",
00082                                _outputColName,
00083                                std::string("AhcTemperature"));
00084  }

00089   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00090   void SiPMTemperatureProcessor::init()
00091   {
00092     _ahcSroModDataCol                = NULL;
00093     _temperatureSensorCalibrationCol = NULL;
00094 
00095     _ahcSroModDataColChanged                = false;
00096     _temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged = false;
00097 
00098     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099     std::stringstream message;
00100     message << "undefined conditions: ";
00101     bool error = false;
00102 
00103     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104     _mapper = dynamic_cast<const AhcMapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00105 
00106     if ( ! _mapper )
00107       {
00108         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName 
00109                 << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00110         error = true;
00111       }
00112 
00113     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114     if (_tempProviderModelName == "simple")
00115       {
00116         _tempProvider = new AhcSimpleTempProvider();     
00117         _tempProvider->setSanityRange(0, 45);
00118       }
00119     else if (_tempProviderModelName == "Cern2010")
00120       {
00121         _tempProvider = new AhcCern2010TempProvider(_mapper);
00122       }
00123     else if (_tempProviderModelName == "MedianFilter")
00124       {
00125         _tempProvider = new AhcMedianFilterTempProvider(_mapper);
00126         _tempProvider->setSanityRange(0, 45);
00127       }
00128     else
00129       {
00130         message<<" Undefined model "<<_tempProviderModelName<<" for the temperature provider"<<std::endl;
00131         error = true;
00132       }
00133  
00134     _tempProviderMap[Processor::name()] = _tempProvider;
00135 
00136 
00137     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138     /* registration of the conditions change listeners has to go here*/
00139     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ahcSroModDataColName))
00140       {
00141         message << " undefined conditions: " <<_ahcSroModDataColName << std::endl;
00142         error = true;
00143       }
00144     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _temperatureSensorCalibrationColName))
00145       {
00146         message << " undefined conditions: " <<_temperatureSensorCalibrationColName << std::endl;
00147         error = true;
00148       }
00149 
00150     if (error)
00151       {
00152         streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00153         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00154       }
00155 
00156     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00157    _colTemperature = NULL;
00158 
00159     _conditionsHandler = new CALICE::RunTimeConditionsHandler(_outputColName);
00160     lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->registerHandler(_outputColName, _conditionsHandler);
00161   }
00162 
00163   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00164   /*                                                             */
00165   /*                                                             */
00166   /*                                                             */
00167   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00168   void SiPMTemperatureProcessor::conditionsChanged(LCCollection *col)
00169   {
00170     std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00171 
00172     if (colName == _ahcSroModDataColName)
00173       {
00174         _ahcSroModDataCol        = col;
00175         _ahcSroModDataColChanged = true;
00176       }
00177     else if (colName == _temperatureSensorCalibrationColName)
00178       {
00179         _temperatureSensorCalibrationCol        = col;
00180         _temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged = true;
00181       }
00182     else
00183       {
00184         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "SiPMTemperatureProcessor: Called as conditions listener for collection " << colName 
00185                      << ", but not responsible." << std::endl;
00186         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00187       }
00188 
00189   }
00190 
00191   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00192   /*                                                             */
00193   /*                                                             */
00194   /*                                                             */
00195   /*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
00196   void SiPMTemperatureProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt)
00197   {
00198     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n Event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<std::endl;
00199     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" _ahcSroModDataColChanged: "<<_ahcSroModDataColChanged
00200                  <<" (collection "<<_ahcSroModDataColName
00201                  <<")"<<std::endl;
00202     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" _temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged: "
00203                  <<_temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged
00204                  <<" (collection "<<_temperatureSensorCalibrationColName<<")"
00205                  <<std::endl;
00206 
00207 
00208     if (_ahcSroModDataColChanged == true)
00209       {
00210         _tempProvider->setAhcSroModBlocks(_ahcSroModDataCol);
00211       }
00212 
00213     if (_temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged == true)
00214       {
00215         _tempProvider->setCalibrations(_temperatureSensorCalibrationCol);
00216       }
00217 
00218 
00219     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n maxModule: "<< _mapper->getMaxModule()<<" maxChip: "<<_mapper->getMaxChip()<<" maxChannel: "<<_mapper->getMaxChannel()<<endl;
00220     /*fill the temperature container if something changed in the temperature provider*/
00221     if (_ahcSroModDataColChanged == true || _temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged == true)
00222       {
00223         _colTemperature = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00224 
00225         /*yes, the AHCAL modules start from 1, because _mapper->getMaxModule() gives either 31 or 39*/
00226         for (unsigned int module = 1; module < _mapper->getMaxModule(); ++module)
00227           {
00228             for (unsigned int chip = 0; chip < _mapper->getMaxChip(); ++chip)
00229               {
00230                 for (unsigned int channel = 0; channel < _mapper->getMaxChannel(); ++channel)
00231                   {
00232                     const float temperature = _tempProvider->getCellTemp(module, chip, channel);
00233                     const float temperatureError = _tempProvider->getCellTempError(module, chip, channel);
00234 
00235                     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"   mod/chip/chan="<<module<<"/"<<chip<<"/"<<channel<<" temperature="<<temperature<<" +- "<<temperatureError<<endl;
00236                     try {
00237                       int moduleID = _mapper->getDecoder()->getModuleID(module, chip, channel);
00238                       
00239                       SimpleValue *val = new SimpleValue(moduleID, temperature, temperatureError, 1);
00240                       _colTemperature->addElement(val);
00241                       
00242                       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" moduleID="<<moduleID<<std::endl;
00243                     }                        
00244                     catch(BadDataException& e)
00245                       {
00246                         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " invalid cell id for module " << module <<", chip "<<chip
00247                                       <<" and channel "<<channel<<" \n"<< e.what() << std::endl;
00248                       }
00249                 
00250                   }
00251               }
00252           }/*end loop over module*/
00253 
00254         const std::string encoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00255         LCParameters &theParam =  _colTemperature->parameters();
00256         theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, encoding);
00257         
00258         _conditionsHandler->update(_colTemperature);
00259         
00260         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" updating colTemperature: "<<_colTemperature<<endl;
00261       }
00262 
00263     /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00264     if (_ahcSroModDataColChanged == true)
00265       _ahcSroModDataColChanged = false;
00266     if (_temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged == true)
00267       _temperatureSensorCalibrationColChanged = false;
00268     
00269   }
00270 
00271 
00272 }/*end of namespace CALICE*/
